snippet: The Staten Island district attorney, Daniel M. Donovan Jr., was appointed on Friday to look into allegations of sexual harassment against Assemblyman Vito J. Lopez of Brooklyn.
abstract: Staten Island District Attorney Daniel M Donovan Jr is named as special prosecutor to investigate allegations of sexual harassment against Assemblyman Vito J Lopez of Brooklyn; development deepens the legal troubles of Lopez, Democratic Party leader, and the State Assembly; New York State Joint Commission on Public Ethics has already begun its own handling of the claims made against Lopez.
lead_paragraph: The Staten Island district attorney, Daniel M. Donovan Jr., was appointed on Friday to look into allegations of sexual harassment against Assemblyman Vito J. Lopez of Brooklyn.

headline.seo: Special Prosecutor to Investigate Vito Lopez in Sexual Harassment Case
headline.main: Special Prosecutor to Investigate Lawmaker in Harassment Case
